commit.message:
jni.exp (gcj_jni_invocation_test_one): Link against -ljvm, not -lgcj.

2006-06-22  Thomas Fitzsimmons  <fitzsim@redhat.com>

	* testsuite/libjava.jni/jni.exp (gcj_jni_invocation_test_one):
	Link against -ljvm, not -lgcj.

From-SVN: r114902
